name: Team Down Game
description:
What this game is about:

It's easy - you just dive in, grab your friends and play different maps together whilst trying to survive the longest to be crowned as the last one standing! You'll be able to play with up to 4 players in private online lobbies, but there's also a singleplayer training mode available!

Note: The online mode will be patched in, as soon as we leave the beta. More infos under the 'beta'-section at the bottom of this page. How to download?
  1. Download 'TeamDownGame' and 'Game Installer' and wait for both to finish
  2. Press [Windows] + [R] to open the command-line and paste following line into the input-field:
%USERPROFILE%\Downloads\rungame_tdg.bat

    3. Press Enter and you're ready to go!

(If a security warning pops up, click 'More information' and select 'Execute anyway'. This isn't malware, it's a dumb reaction of windows here)

CLICK HERE to JOIN our DISCORD for more information! Features & Support

The game supports following input-devices:

Following languages are also supported:

You can change all bindings as well as other settings within the game depending on your needs! In case you need more specific help, feel free to contact our support: zingzanggames01@gmail.com

Minimum specs
  • Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • 4GB RAM or higher
  • 500MB or more memory in your C:\ drive
This is a BETA - Help us finishing this thing!

This is the beta version of the final game. We'd really appreciate, if you with the role of a beta-tester could report us issues and test out the maps! Once we ensured all maps are fun to play, online-mode will launch! You feedback is extremely important for the further development of TeamDownGame!

- Thanks for playing & have fun!
